tasks.task_description: Create missing marketplace-company-settings table in DynamoDB
Add CompanySettingsTableName output to CloudFormation stack
Add InvoiceBucketName output to CloudFormation stack

description: Complete GST deployment by creating missing company settings table and adding missing stack outputs
context: Created marketplace-company-settings-1764183053 table in DynamoDB with companyId as hash key, PAY_PER_REQUEST billing mode
Recreated marketplace-company-settings-1764183053 table with correct schema (settingKey as partition key)

Manually updated GST environment variables in lambda-env.json since CloudFormation outputs are blocked by validation errors. Both CompanySettingsTableName and InvoiceBucketName resources exist and are configured.
